description: This file defines a UI component 'RecipesList' for displaying a list of recipes with filtering, search, pagination, and accessibility features. It uses external components such as SidebarFilters, SearchBar, RecipeCard, Pagination, Loader, and LiveRegion, and manages state through a store and actions.

classes.name: Component (from Blits)
classes.description: A class/component provided by the LightningJS framework used to define UI components.

methods.name: $isFocused
methods.description: Checks if a grid item at index i is currently focused for visual indication.

methods.name: moveFocus
methods.description: Moves focus within the grid by a delta, constrained within current page items.

methods.name: moveRow
methods.description: Moves focus up or down across grid rows.

methods.name: $announce
methods.description: Announces messages via the live region for accessibility.
